text: He feels satisfaction "from the fact that my personality had been tested and weighed and not found wanting. He feels like Pontius Pilate who washed his hands before the multitude saying: 'I am innocent of the blood of this just person.' Like Dr. Globke, whom I interviewed the other day, Eichmann said:
